say_hello[source]

say_hello(to)

Say hello to somebody

{% endraw %} {% raw %}

Prodb API

Create pandas dataframe for manipulation

{% raw %}

generate_db[source]

generate_db(dbpath='db.csv', prefill=False)

Create example database

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
generate_db(prefill=True)
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
df.head()

insert_row[source]

insert_row(df, data, dbpath='db.csv')

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
df = pd.read_csv('db.csv')
display(df.head())

data = {'name':'Geo', 'mood': 'ðŸ‘¹', 'message':'hi'}
df = insert_row(df, data)
display(df)
